allow: Bash(python -c "import asyncio; from src.agents.observer import ObserverAgent; from src.agents.reasoner import ReasonerAgent; from src.agents.actor import ActorAgent; from src.agents.validator import ValidatorAgent; from src.agents.memory import MemoryAgent; from src.agents.executor import ExecutorAgent; from src.agents.analyzer import AnalyzerAgent; from src.agents.learner import LearnerAgent; from src.agents.improver import ImproverAgent; exec\(open\(''9agent_pantheon_test.py''\).read\(\)\); asyncio.run\(run_pantheon_demo\(''Test task: Create a simple hello world program''\)\)")

Bash(python -c "import asyncio; from src.agents.observer import ObserverAgent; from src.agents.reasoner import ReasonerAgent; from src.agents.actor import ActorAgent; from src.agents.validator import ValidatorAgent; from src.agents.memory import MemoryAgent; exec\(open\(''single_session_test_loop.py''\).read\(\)\); asyncio.run\(run_single_agent_with_validation\(\)\)")

Bash(python -c "import asyncio; from src.agents.observer import ObserverAgent; from src.agents.reasoner import ReasonerAgent; from src.agents.actor import ActorAgent; exec\(open\(''interactive_session_example.py''\).read\(\)\); asyncio.run\(run_single_agent_demo\(\)\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: ZEJZL.NET Multi-Agent AI Framework

- Implement 9-agent Pantheon orchestration system
- Add async message bus with Redis + SQLite persistence
- Support 7 AI providers \(ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, Grok, DeepSeek, Qwen, Zai\)
- Include interactive CLI with multiple operation modes
- Add comprehensive CLAUDE.md documentation
- Include test files for all agent workflows

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Update README with comprehensive documentation

- Add detailed project description and features
- Include architecture diagram and agent descriptions
- Add installation and setup instructions
- Document all CLI commands and usage examples
- Include configuration details for all providers
- Add development guidelines and roadmap
- Provide testing commands

Co-Authored-By: Claude Sonnet 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
